error.msg: The struct 'timer_type' does not have a constructor although it has private member variables. Member variables of builtin types are left uninitialized when the class is instantiated. That may cause bugs or undefined behavior.
Member variable 'event_obj::timer_copy' is not initialized in the constructor.
Member variable 'event_obj::execution_rule' is not initialized in the constructor.
